sentence.Network_cn: 她用探问的目光看看我说：“怎么样？”

sentence.Network_en: She glanced at Wu Chih - sheng inquiringly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她询问似的向吴芝生看了一眼.

sentence.Network_en: The warden at the glass door looked in inquiringly.
sentence.Network_cn: 监狱长从玻璃门外询问地窥视了一下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 近似字词-新浪字典 ... inquiline 寄居动物; 寄居物 inquiringly 诧异地;怀疑地 inquiry U询问,探问;C质询,调查.
Noirtier looked inquiringly at his granddaughter ., 诺瓦蒂埃疑问地望着他的孙女儿.

entry.def: If you have an inquiring mind, you have a great interest in learning new things.

example.ex: I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned...
example.tran: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

example.ex: All this helps children to develop an inquiring attitude to learning.
example.tran: 所有这些都有助于培养孩子好学爱问的态度。

entry.def: If someone has an inquiring expression on their face, they are showing that they want to know something.

sentences.sentence: "Tom Swift looked at his cabin mates inquiringly"

auth_sentence.content: None of us looked inquiringly around to gauge the others' response.
auth_sentence.res_content: None of us looked inquiringly around to gauge the others' response.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of us looked inquiringly around to gauge the others' response.

auth_sentence.content: Betty looked at me inquiringly, as in the old days, a pretty bird with its head cocked, wondering who I could possibly be.
auth_sentence.res_content: Betty looked at me inquiringly, as in the old days, a pretty bird with its head cocked, wondering who I could possibly be.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Betty looked at me inquiringly, as in the old days, a pretty bird with its head cocked, wondering who I could possibly be.
